issue.title: [Packaging] Ensure to run pyarrow unit tests in conda and wheel builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3161](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3161). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Wheel linux and wheel osx run pyarrow tests too, others only test the imports.
